description.name: cbbtcerc20
description.tagline: CBBTC erc20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto erc20-cbbtc Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept CBBTC erc20 directly on your website
Unique erc20/cbbtc receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your erc20/cbbtc wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
